```{r}
dfKwic <- as.data.frame(kwic(toks,
           pattern = phrase(klima), separator = " "))


dates <- data.frame(docname = docnames(raw_corpus), date = docvars(raw_corpus)$date)
dates$year <- as.numeric(substring(dates$date, 1,4))

dfMerged <- merge(dfKwic,dates)

table(dfKwic$pattern)



```

```{r}
klimadict<- dictionary(list(klima = klima))


dfm <- dfm(raw_corpus)

results <- dfm%>%
  dfm_tolower()%>%
  dfm_lookup(klimadict)

dfKlima <- convert(results, to = "data.frame")

dfKlima$quarter <- floor_date(docvars(dfm)$date, "quarter")

results_quarter <- dfKlima %>%
  select(quarter, klima)%>%
  group_by(quarter)%>%
  reframe(
    klima = sum(klima)
  )

```


## Validierung

```{r}
dfVal <- merge(results_quarter, dfGroup1)

cor(dfVal$klima, dfVal$Klima)
```
### Split-half reliabilität

```{r}
pattern <- klima
reliability <- list()

for (i in c(0:1000)){
  
  half_1 <- sample(
  x = pattern,
  size = round(length(pattern)/2, 0),
  replace = FALSE
  )
  half_2 <- pattern[!(pattern %in% half_1)]
  
  results1 <- dfm%>%
  dfm_tolower()%>%
  dfm_lookup(half1)
  
  results1 <- convert(results1, to = "data.frame")
  
  results2 <- dfm%>%
  dfm_tolower()%>%
  dfm_lookup(half2)
  
  results2 <- convert(results2, to = "data.frame")

  relia <- spearman_brown(results1,  results2)
  reliability[i] <- relia
}
  
saveRDS(reliability, file = "refugeeRelia.RDS") 
```

### Wordclouds

```{r}
textplot <- function(text, min_freq = 25){
  text <- gsub("dass","",text)
  dtm <- dfm(text) %>%
    dfm(remove = stopwords('german')) %>%
    dfm_wordstem() %>%
    dfm_trim(min_termfreq = min_freq , verbose = FALSE)
  
  set.seed(100)
  textplot_wordcloud(dtm)
  
}
```

```{r}
dfKwic <- as.data.frame(kwic(toks,
```
